data.description: A interface for send sms from taiwan website
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I want develop many Perl Module about Send SMS from some website
    that provide service of send sms by pay money.

    Because of the reason that these Website provide service only for
    people in Taiwan , so I want to register the Namespace: WWW::TWSMS.

    In the future, I will develop some Perl Module as under
    WWW::TWSMS::emome (send sms by http://www.emome.net/)
    WWW::TWSMS::pchome (send sms by http://sms.pchome.com.tw/)
    WWW::TWSMS::hinet (send sms by http://hiair.hinet.net/)
    WWW::TWSMS::phs (send sms by http://www.phs.com.tw/)
